intro.title: Welcome to Uzbekistan
intro.description: Located in the heart of Central Asia, Uzbekistan offers travelers a glimpse into ancient civilizations along the historic Silk Road. From the stunning architecture of Samarkand to the desert fortresses of Khiva, our country is a treasure trove of cultural and natural wonders waiting to be explored.
